    • Constructor Detail

      • SpellCard

        public SpellCard(int id,
                 java.lang.String name,
                 int resourceCost,
                 java.util.List<Element> elementCost)
        Instantiates a new SpellCard.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the card
        name - the name of the card
        resourceCost - the cost in resources to play the card
        elementCost - the cost in elements to play the card

    • Method Detail

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Resets the spell card's requirements. This function has to be called at the end of play (if play returns true) in all spell cards.
